queries.variant: creature that flies and is undead while inducing fear

queries.query: chaotic neutral undead that can move through objects and frightens nearby foes
queries.variant: chaotic-neutral creature that scares foes and passes through objects

queries.variant: undead with necrotic attacks and high mobility, medium size

queries.variant: creature that is ghost-like, unaffected by poison and various conditions
